const response = await client.security.putRole({
  name: "only_remote_access_role",
  remote_indices: [
    {
      clusters: ["my_remote"],
      names: ["logs*"],
      privileges: ["read", "read_cross_cluster", "view_index_metadata"],
    },
  ],
  remote_cluster: [
    {
      clusters: ["my_remote"],
      privileges: ["monitor_stats"],
    },
  ],
});
console.log(response);
